ing.item: BY 26-INCH SHEET PAN TEMPERATURE: 400 F. OVEN

directions.step:
1. PLACE SAUSAGE ON 3 SHEET PANS (18 BY 26-INCH); BAKE IN 400 F. OVEN 10 MINUTES OR UNTIL HEATED. TURN AFTER 5 MINUTES.
Recipe Number: L09101
SERVING SIZE: 2 LINKS
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
